summary.span: 为固定格式的高保真页面提供内容。

span.span: Provides the content for a high fidelity, fixed-format page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用于内的页面提供内容。 is typically used to provide the content for a page within a . 自动定义的开始和结束其内容在分页符。 automatically defines page breaks at the start and end of its content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用类。The following example shows use of the class. [!code-csharp[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedPage5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpfContent.cs#xpssavecreatefixedpage5)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedPage5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpfcontent.vb#xpssavecreatefixedpage5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Rect BleedBox { System::Windows::Rect get(); void set(System::Windows::Rect value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个为出血、注册标记和裁切标记定义溢出区域的矩形。

span.span: Gets or sets a rectangle defining the overflow area for bleeds, registration marks, and crop marks.
The defining the overflow area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于指定扩展的区域来打印生产相关的出血、 注册标记和裁剪标记可能超出逻辑页。 is used to specify an expanded area for print production-related bleeds, registration marks, and crop marks that may extend outside the logical page. 逻辑页是表的已裁剪到其最终大小后，会保留的一部分。The logical page is the part of the sheet that will remain after it has been cropped to its final size. 因此出血框的大小可以小于逻辑页大小，但可能更大。So the dimensions of the bleed box can be no smaller than the logical page size, but may be greater. 对比度与这是在其可显示内容; 页的区域，即的页属于*内*边距。Contrast the with the which is the area of the page on which content can appear; that is, the part of the page that is *within* the margins. 因此内容框的大小可以是不大于页上，但可能较小。So the dimensions of the content box can be no larger than the page, but may be smaller. 和出血框和内容框中的属性从左侧进行计量和和顶部度量属性。The and properties of both the bleed box and the content box are measured from the left and the and properties are measured from the top. 因此，以下规则也必须在定义中强制执行和:Hence, the following rules must be enforced in defining the and : - .. 必须小于或等于。。must be less than or equal to .. - .. 必须小于或等于。。must be less than or equal to .. - .. 必须大于或等于。。must be greater than or equal to .. - .. 必须大于或等于。。must be greater than or equal to .. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取 子元素的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the child elements.
The of the child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回`null`如果为数据绑定和子元素不能添加或手动删除。 returns `null` if the is data-bound and child elements cannot be added or removed manually. 在未绑定数据的使用时，手动允许应用程序到或子元素。In non data-bound uses, allows the application to manually or child elements.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Rect ContentBox { System::Windows::Rect get(); void set(System::Windows::Rect value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置内容区域的边框，即位于边距（如果有）内 的页面区域。

span.span: Gets or sets the bounding rectangle of the content area; that is, the area of the page *within* the margins, if any.
The that defines the content area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在定义过程中会强制执行以下规则:The following rules must be enforced in defining the : - .. 必须大于或等于零 (0)，并且小于或等于 (。为-1)。must be greater than or equal to zero (0), and less than or equal to (.-1). - .. 必须大于或等于零 (0)，并且小于或等于 (。为-1)。must be greater than or equal to zero (0), and less than or equal to (.-1). - .. 必须大于或等于 (。+ 1)。must be greater than or equal to (.+1). - .. 必须大于或等于 (。+ 1)。must be greater than or equal to (.+1). - 有关的相对大小规则和，请参阅主题。For rules about the relative sizes of the and the , see the topic . - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段- Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|- None- None| -

summary.span: 获取或设置与页面关联的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is associated with the page.
The for the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A介绍有关应如何打印材料; 例如，是否双面打印应使用。A contains information about how material should be printed; for example, whether or not two-sided printing should be used. 设置此 属性不会验证或修改特定 的指定 。Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified for a particular . 如果需要，请使用 方法创建特定于 的 （对给定打印机有效）。If needed, use the method to create a -specific that is valid for a given printer. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetBottom (System.Windows.UIElement element, double length);
.method public static hidebysig void SetBottom(class System.Windows.UIElement element, float64 length) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetBottom (element As UIElement, length As Double)
public: static void SetBottom(System::Windows::UIElement ^ element, double length);

param.name: element
param.span: 要在其上设置底部偏移量的元素。

span.span: The element on which to set the bottom offset.

param.name: length
param.span: 元素的底部与其父画布的底部之间的新距离。

span.span: The new distance between the bottom side of the element and the bottom side of its parent canvas.

summary.span: 设置某元素的底部与其父 的底部之间的距离。

span.span: Sets the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子元素的底部偏移量不会影响与父画布的大小。The child element's bottom offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas. 如果已在同一元素上指定了顶部和底部偏移量，顶部的偏移量优先。If both a top and a bottom offset have been specified on the same element, the top offset takes precedence. 如果设置为百分比偏移量的底部，百分比值基于与父画布的大小。When setting the bottom offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the size of the parent canvas.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetLeft (System.Windows.UIElement element, double length);
.method public static hidebysig void SetLeft(class System.Windows.UIElement element, float64 length) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetLeft (element As UIElement, length As Double)

param.name: element
param.span: 要在其上设置左侧偏移量的元素。

span.span: The element on which to set the left offset.

param.name: length
param.span: 元素的左侧与其父画布的左侧之间的新距离。

span.span: The new distance between the left side of the element and the left side of its parent canvas.

summary.span: 设置某元素的左侧与其父 的左侧之间的距离。

span.span: Sets the distance between the left side of an element and the left side of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子元素的左侧偏移量不会影响与父画布的大小。The child element's left offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas. 如果已在同一元素上指定同时左侧和右侧的偏移量，左侧的偏移量优先。If both a left and right offset have been specified on the same element, the left offset takes precedence. 设置时左侧的偏移量的百分比，则会将百分比值基于与父画布的宽度。When setting the left offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the width of the parent canvas. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用方法。The following example shows use of the method. [!code-csharp[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedPage5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpfContent.cs#xpssavecreatefixedpage5)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedPage5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpfcontent.vb#xpssavecreatefixedpage5)]
